verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: directed] [ARG1: officials] [ARG2: to draw up a list of a further $ 200 billion worth of Chinese imports to be targeted with further tariffs] , [ARGM-ADV: leaving Chinese stocks hit hard] — the sell - off looks set to spread to Europe , with most markets down around 1 % in early trade .
